name: Chef's Son
description:
The Chef's son is left alone in the kitchen and has to prepare food for the customers. Be careful not to drop the food on the ground: the dog could take advantage of it!
In Game B you will also have to be careful not to burn yourself with boiling pots and a mischievous little mouse will try to get you off with the right rhythm!
Challenge your friends to beat your records!
The incredible experience of diving back in the 80s while having fun with the exciting portable LCD game consoles. Graphics, sounds, visual effects are faithfully reproduced and designed to let you totally immerse yourself in the game.
Try the easy Game A and the harder Game B.
Collect all the Back to the 80's Games!
